verses.verse: Doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7121>cry?<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> put <S%H5414>forth<s%> her <S%H6963>voice?<s%>
She <S%H5324>standeth<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of high <S%H4791>places,<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H1004>places<s%> of the <S%H5410>paths.<s%>
She <S%H7442>crieth<s%> <S%H3027>at<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> at the <S%H6310>entry<s%> of the <S%H7176>city,<s%> at the <S%H3996>coming<s%> in at the <S%H6607>doors.<s%>
Unto <S%H413><s%> you, O <S%H376>men,<s%> I <S%H7121>call;<s%> and my <S%H6963>voice<s%> is <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>
O ye <S%H6612>simple,<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6195>wisdom:<s%> and, ye <S%H3684>fools,<s%> be ye of an <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Hear; <S%H8085><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> of excellent <S%H5057>things;<s%> and the <S%H4669>opening<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall be right <S%H4339>things.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1897>speak<s%> <S%H571>truth;<s%> and <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are in <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> there is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H6617>froward<s%> or <S%H6141>perverse<s%> in them.
They are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5228>plain<s%> to him that <S%H995>understandeth,<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> to them that <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
Receive <S%H3947><s%> my <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> rather than choice <S%H4480>gold.<s%> <S%H977><s%> <S%H2742><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>rubies;<s%> <S%H6443><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the things that may be <S%H2656>desired<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> to be <S%H7737>compared<s%> to it.
I <S%H589><s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> with <S%H6195>prudence,<s%> and find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of witty <S%H4209>inventions.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is to <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> <S%H1344>pride,<s%> and <S%H1347>arrogance,<s%> and the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H8419>froward<s%> <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> do I <S%H8130>hate.<s%>
Counsel <S%H6098><s%> is mine, and sound <S%H8454>wisdom:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H998>understanding;<s%> I have <S%H1369>strength.<s%>
By me <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and <S%H7336>princes<s%> <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H6664>justice.<s%>
By me <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H8323>rule,<s%> and <S%H5081>nobles,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> <S%H157>love<s%> them that <S%H157>love<s%> me; and those that seek me <S%H7836>early<s%> shall <S%H4672>find<s%> me.
Riches <S%H6239><s%> and <S%H3519>honor<s%> are <S%H854>with<s%> me; yea, <S%H6276>durable<s%> <S%H1952>riches<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

My <S%H6529>fruit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H4480>gold,<s%> <S%H2742><s%> yea, than fine <S%H4480>gold;<s%> <S%H6337><s%> and my <S%H8393>revenue<s%> than <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H4480>silver.<s%> <S%H3701><s%>
I <S%H1980>lead<s%> in the <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5410>paths<s%> of judgment: <S%H4941><s%>
That I may cause those that <S%H157>love<s%> me to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H3426>substance;<s%> and I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H214>treasures.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7069>possessed<s%> me in the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%> his <S%H4659>works<s%> of <S%H4480>old.<s%> <S%H227><s%>
I was set <S%H5258>up<s%> from <S%H4480>everlasting,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> from the <S%H4480>beginning,<s%> <S%H7218><s%> or <S%H4480>ever<s%> <S%H6924><s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was.
When there were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8415>depths,<s%> I was brought <S%H2342>forth;<s%> when there were <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4599>fountains<s%> <S%H3513>abounding<s%> with <S%H4325>water.<s%>
Before <S%H2962><s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H2883>settled,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> was I brought forth: <S%H2343><s%>

While as <S%H5704>yet<s%> he had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> nor the <S%H2351>fields,<s%> nor the highest <S%H7218>part<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H8398>world.<s%>

When he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H8033>there:<s%> when he <S%H2710>set<s%> a <S%H2329>compass<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the depth: <S%H8415><s%>
When he <S%H553>established<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> <S%H4480>above:<s%> <S%H4605><s%> when he <S%H5810>strengthened<s%> the <S%H5869>fountains<s%> of the deep: <S%H8415><s%>

When he <S%H7760>gave<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> his <S%H2706>decree,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> his <S%H6310>commandment:<s%> when he <S%H2710>appointed<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%>

Then I <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> him, as one brought <S%H525>up<s%> with him: and I <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> his <S%H8191>delight,<s%> <S%H7832>rejoicing<s%> <S%H3605>always<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him;
Rejoicing <S%H7832><s%> in the habitable <S%H8398>part<s%> of his <S%H776>earth;<s%> and my <S%H8191>delights<s%> were <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me, O ye <S%H1121>children:<s%> for <S%H835>blessed<s%> are they that <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H4148>instruction,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> and <S%H6544>refuse<s%> it <S%H408>not.<s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> me, <S%H8245>watching<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H1817>gates,<s%> <S%H8104>waiting<s%> at the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of my <S%H6607>doors.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> whoso <S%H4672>findeth<s%> me <S%H4672>findeth<s%> <S%H2416>life,<s%> and shall <S%H6329>obtain<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> of the <S%H4480>LORD.<s%> <S%H3068><s%>
But he that sinneth <S%H2398>against<s%> me <S%H2554>wrongeth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4194>death.<s%>
